message.body: I was trying to make sure I sat some place where I could talk to Peggy lol..
Oh so u scoped her out at tea time huh?
Yeah, but I didn't know she was going to the restaurant with us.
Yea that was quite a shock to me also. I never met her and she wanted to join. So I said okay. I didn't even know her name.
I actually met her at the first TeaTime we went to. I didn't recognize her until we sat down at the restaurant.
(1/2) Oh the thing with Kosuke and morgan is goin nowhere. They will remain friends. He just not in to her and both are inexperienced in the terms of intimate
You can, but there's a shitty process to go through.
Well fuck a duck. That shut sucks. Yea I think u might have to develop this slowly.
